segments.advisor_message: Okay, uh, first let's get your name down, can I have, like, your first name and last name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, sure! My name's, uh, Sarah Connors.

segments.advisor_message: Alright, Sarah! And, um, do you have a title or anything like that you go by? Or, like, any middle names?
segments.client_message: Oh, just Sarah Connors, no middle names or title, that's all I go by.
